author: Minifig_Man
title: Great accessory pack
review:
A good idea to release an accessory pack for the Duplo trains. I could've done without the 3 blocks and used an extra rail piece.

Pros

  • Good diversity of parts
  • Lot's of rails

Cons

  • Only one crossing barrier? What about the Duplo people coming from the other side?
  • Would've been nice to have a bridge, a signal light or some special parts.

Overall a nice set.
